function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Occupant behavior leading to virus transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex human behaviors with temporal dynamics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitation in understanding holistic overview of data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious disease propagation through human-building interactions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on long-term effects of human-building interactions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stochastic modelling paradigms for simulating occupant behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The focus on virus transmission and its impact on architectural design and facility planning","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simulating the locations or moving trajectories of people in architectural-scale designs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporating agency into virtual humans to evaluate design with multi-occupant scenarios","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for virus transmission in early design evaluation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate analysis of space occupancy and human behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on already constructed and occupied environments for research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of virus transmission within the context of covid-19 due to the design of the occupancy simulation system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited exploration of how to apply technology in an interactive tool to support facility planning and analysis procedures in the hci community.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential lack of consideration for other human factors in space analysis tools, such as spatial ergonomics, productivity, and social and physical comfort.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dynamic human-building interactions influencing virus transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Customization of space configurations and occupant behaviors for occupancy simulation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding routes of virus transmission in specific conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus transmission due to the large number of passersby throughout the day in a particular area.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential asynchronous transmission of the virus by a single individual contaminating a shared environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of ability to analyze decisions within the context of relevant human-building interactions and their relationships to potential virus spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus transmission via surfaces and air circulation within the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for social and physical interactions among occupants and the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existing systems that only follow simple measures such as physical distancing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased number of tweets about neighbour noise due to lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in perceived outdoor noise level and increase in perceived neighbour noise level during the lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Respondents more annoyed by neighbour noise than outdoor noise during the lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data collection from a specific location, period, and language may not represent a comprehensive picture of noise complaints and sources.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manual identification of noise sources from social media data limits the scalability and accuracy of the analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of objective data on noise measurement and sound insulation of buildings hinders accurate assessment of indoor noise sources.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in outdoor noise levels due to travel restrictions during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive and natural sound sources becoming disturbing during reduced outdoor noise levels","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in annoyance ratings of neighbor noise during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased annoyance ratings due to neighbor noise during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistency in noise annoyance research results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Changes in neighbor and outdoor noise patterns during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased neighbour noise during lockdown due to more people staying and working from home.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased neighbour noise complaints during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial increase in time spent on entertainment during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in diy and home repairs during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in annoyance ratings due to lockdown may lead to a false sense of improvement in noise issues, potentially causing complacency in preventative measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consistent high annoyance ratings during lockdown suggest underlying factors contributing to dissatisfaction with noise levels.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in transportation noise during lockdown does not significantly impact annoyance levels from outdoor noise sources.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased negative perception of bird songs in urban areas due to reduced ambient noise levels during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction noise becoming more dominant in the urban environment during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in attitudes towards outdoor noise levels during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased annoyance ratings for neighbour noise sources","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in outdoor noise levels due to lockdown measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints on social media","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher percentage of responses hearing neighbor noise in flats","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
